steps.title: Makeup is a great option to look feminine to feel feminine.
steps.content: Makeup is a great option to look feminine to feel feminine. But I emphasize that you don't overdo it. Apply minimal foundation and blush to your cheeks to obtain a radiant appearance. Eye shadow and liner is also a sweet look if not over the top. [3] X Research source A sweet feminine cologne is also a terrific method to look and feel feminine plus smelling sweet as sugar.

steps.title: Select the right shoes.
steps.content: Select the right shoes. High heels also come in handy to achieve height if you are small in height, however don't overdo the size of the heel. If you are uncomfortable in heels nice feminine flats are just as great.

steps.content: Develop your feminine personality. [4] X Research source Personality and behaviour must be perfected to achieve a feminine persona. When walking stand straight, shoulders back and head up, avoid slouching as this is perceived as a masculine trait.
